name: MIIX INSURANCE CO. in Rehabilitation GHS-Parkview Hospital, Petitioners v. Scott EPSTEIN, D.O. and Renee Marie Bender, D.O., Respondents
name_abbreviation: Miix Insurance Co. in Rehabilitation GHS-Parkview Hospital v. Epstein

parties: MIIX INSURANCE CO. in Rehabilitation GHS-Parkview Hospital, Petitioners v. Scott EPSTEIN, D.O. and Renee Marie Bender, D.O., Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of August, 2015, the stay is DISSOLVED, and the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DISMISSED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
121 A.3d 956
MIIX INSURANCE CO. in Rehabilitation GHS-Parkview Hospital, Petitioners v. Scott EPSTEIN, D.O. and Renee Marie Bender, D.O., Respondents.
